metadata.title: CVE-2024-5702 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Memory corruption in the networking stack could have led to a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125, Firefox ESR <115.12, and Thunderbird < 115.12.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
